description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Neelan Choksi - President and COO of Tasktop

ABSTRACT
Why is it that the industry that created lean manufacturing is having such difficulties applying the concepts of lean to software delivery?  Given that software is now the most expensive part of the modern automobile, the companies that solve this problem will be able to innovate far beyond their peers. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7767

title: Transforming Car Development
